title: Let Her Deal With Them (7R63)
text:
Set:	The Return of the King
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot Gollum or Smeagol. Bearer must be a minion. Limit 1 per bearer. Bearer is damage +1. If you have initiative during the Shadow phase, you may play this condition from your discard pile.
Rarity:	R
